05.03.2021

Congratulations to dear women on March 8!

Dear women, we congratulate you on International Women's Day! The team of JSC "Nitek Instruments" wishes you prosperity, success, professional achievements, personal victories, health and prosperity! Let light and warmth pour into your hearts every spring day! We wish you to become more successful and happier!

04.03.2021

The Elemental Microanalysis website has a new catalog of capsules!

The catalog contains an updated and expanded range of capsules for CHNSO analysis, as well as devices and accessories for sample preparation.

Read more

04

—

about

ABOUT ONLINE STORE

Our online store contains reagents and consumables for elemental analyzers of all manufacturers: Leco, Eltra, Bruker, Elementar, Perkin Elmer, Thermo, HORIBA, Shimadzu, EuroVector, Costech, NC Technologies and many others, including reactors, columns, tin, silver, aluminum and nickel capsules, boats, ceramic crucibles, accelerators (tungsten, iron, tin, copper and others), absorbers (quartz wool, anhydrone, cellulose, copper oxide, sodium hydroxide and others), etc.

CHNSO CORP
